CustomField.description: To show a confirmation confirmation popup message on the submit button click, enter the confirmation message here. If a message is not specified, confirmation popup will not be displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting allows you to specify a confirmation message that will be displayed in a popup when participants click on the submit button. The confirmation message serves as a visual acknowledgment and appreciation for participants' completion of the survey. If no message is specified, the confirmation popup will not be displayed.
CustomField.label: Submit Confirmation Message
